answers.answer: Welcome to the gastroenterology communit!  Yes you still could have kids, but you would want to talk to your doctor first about all of the risks.

The issue with having kids with Crohn's disease is the fact that the inflammation of the GI tract can sometimes result in scarring in the pelvis and damage the Fallopian tubes, preventing pregnancy in the natural mode. This is not the norm however. Most can have kids without any trouble.
